altername_name: Shaun la Oveja: Va de Craneo!
name: Shaun the Sheep: Off His Head
overview: Gameplay and settings based on actual episodes, recreating the fun and unique silent-movie humour Explore the areas based on the series like the field, the barn, the Farmer's house and the circus tent Call on Bitzer The Dog to help you out when the Naughty Pigs are up to their dirty tricks Work with the other found sheep to get around obstacles and access out-of-reach areas Includes 3 game modes: Story Mode, Minigame Mode and Colouring Book Mode
